itemDisplayName: Create a Pay As You Go (PAYG) Environment with an IoT Hub
description: This template enables you to deploy a Pay As You Go (PAYG) Time Series Insights environment that is configured to consume events from an IoT Hub.
summary: This template creates a Pay As You Go (PAYG) Time Series Insights environment, a child event source that reads events from an IoT Hub, and optionally a source IoT Hub.
